item.title: 高管称，亚马逊正竞相开发比英伟达更便宜、更快的人工智能芯片
item.description: 周五下午，在位于德克萨斯州奥斯汀的亚马逊公司芯片实验室内，六七名工程师正在对一款保密的新型服务器设计进行测试。【原文：Inside Amazon.com's chip lab in Austin, Texas, half a dozen engineers on a Friday afternoon put a closely guarded new server design through its paces.】

item.title: 今年的 "万物反弹 "戛然而止，投资者萌生退意
item.description: 从加密货币到黄金，投资者正在放弃今年最喜欢的一些交易，因为耀眼的超级大盘股的回落已经演变成一场多管齐下的大跌，打击了从加密货币到黄金的所有领域，也让判断市场的下一步走势变得更加复杂。【原文：Investors are ditching some of this year's favourite trades as a retreat in the glitzy megacaps has snowballed into a multi-pronged selloff that has hit everything from cryptocurrency to gold, and made calling the market's next move ever more complex.】

item.title: 马斯克将与特斯拉董事会讨论 50 亿美元 xAI 投资事宜
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周四表示，他将讨论对人工智能初创公司xAI投资50亿美元的事宜，这家电动汽车制造商希望加倍努力，加快其机器人出租车和自动驾驶产品的开发。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk said on Thursday he will discuss a $5 billion investment in artificial intelligence startup xAI, as the electric-vehicle maker looks to double down on efforts to expedite the development of its robotaxi and self-driving products.】

item.title: 瓦莱罗计划在 2024 年第三季度将炼油厂的综合产能提高至 92
item.description: 根据投资者关系副总裁 Homer Bhullar 公布的计划，美国炼油商 Valero Energy Corp 计划在 2024 年第三季度将其 14 家炼油厂的总吞吐能力提高到 320 万桶/日的 92%。【原文：U.S. refiner Valero Energy Corp plans to operate its 14 refineries up to 92% of their combined 3.2 million barrel-per-day (bpd) total throughput capacity in the third quarter of 2024, according to plans announced by Homer Bhullar, vice president of investor relations.】

item.title: 科技股动荡冲击市场，英伟达杠杆 ETF 加大投资者风险
item.description: 如果华尔街以科技股为主导的大跌持续下去，对英伟达进行杠杆押注的风险可能会更大。【原文：Making leveraged bets on Nvidia is likely to get much riskier if Wall Street's tech-led selloff continues.】

item.title: 派拉蒙、Skydance 合并案面临股东的法庭挑战
item.description: 根据周三向特拉华州大法官法庭提交的一份诉讼，派拉蒙全球公司的一位投资者起诉阻止其与 Skydance Media 的合并，称该交易将使其股东损失 16.5 亿美元。【原文：A Paramount Global investor has sued to the block its merger with Skydance Media, saying the deal would cost its shareholders $1.65 billion, according to a lawsuit filed in Delaware's Chancery Court on Wednesday.】

item.title: 耶伦称赞拜登经济表现 "非凡"，称美国经济软着陆已步入正轨
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周四称赞美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）实现了 "令人瞩目的经济复苏"，并表示第二季度国内生产总值（GDP）和通胀数据证实美国正走在 "稳定增长和通胀下降 "的道路上。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Thursday lauded President Joe Biden for a "remarkable economic recovery" and said that second-quarter GDP and inflation data confirmed that the U.S. is on a path "to steady growth and declining inflation."】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Meta 将因链接 Marketplace 和 Facebook 而被欧盟处以首张反垄断罚单
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，由于将分类广告服务 Marketplace 与 Facebook 社交网络捆绑在一起，Meta Platforms 将在几周内被欧盟处以首张反垄断罚单。【原文：Meta Platforms is set to be hit in a few weeks with its first EU antitrust fine for tying classified advertisements service Marketplace with its Facebook social network, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，科罗拉多州法官暂时叫停了 Kroger 与 Albertsons 的合并案
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，科罗拉多州一名法官发布命令，暂时阻止克罗格公司（Kroger）和阿尔伯森公司（Albertsons）之间价值 250 亿美元的拟议合并案，该合并案一直受到该州总检察长的质疑。【原文：A Colorado judge issued an order temporarily blocking the proposed $25 billion merger between Kroger and Albertsons , which has been challenged by the state attorney general, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国快餐连锁店押注超值餐饮将面临投资者审查
item.description: 麦当劳和其他快餐连锁店推出的超值套餐的表现将在未来几周美国餐厅公布季度业绩时受到密切关注。【原文：The performance of McDonald's and other fast food chains' value meal launches will be closely watched when the U.S. restaurants report quarterly results over the next few weeks.】

item.title: 印度官员表示，在解决印度的担忧之前，印度不会签署全球税收协议
item.description: 印度财政部一位官员周四表示，除非印度对争端解决和预扣税处理的担忧得到解决，否则印度将不会签署一项针对高利润跨国公司的全球公司税协议。【原文：India will not sign a global corporate tax deal focused on highly profitable multinational firms unless its concerns on dispute resolution and the treatment of withholding tax are addressed, a finance ministry official said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华纳兄弟发现公司将就 NBA 转播权竞标提起诉讼
item.description: 一位熟知内情的消息人士周四透露，华纳兄弟发现公司将在纽约起诉美国国家篮球协会，因为该协会拒绝了华纳兄弟发现公司对电视转播权的匹配竞标。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery will sue the National Basketball Association in New York after the league rejected its matching bid for TV broadcasting rights, a source familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 甲骨文签署使用意大利 Rai Way 数据中心的协议
item.description: 甲骨文公司与意大利基础设施公司 Rai Way 周四表示，甲骨文公司已与 Rai Way 签署协议，将在这家意大利基础设施公司的数据中心安装甲骨文公司的人工智能应用系统。【原文：Oracle has signed an accord with Rai Way to install its systems for artificial intelligence applications at the Italian infrastructure firm's data centres, the two companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 迪斯尼、华纳兄弟推出流媒体捆绑计划，无广告计划每月 30 美元
item.description: 母公司华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）和华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）表示，由 Disney+、Hulu 和 Max 服务组成的流媒体捆绑服务将从本周四起在美国推出，每月价格为 16.99 美元（含广告）和 29.99 美元（不含广告）。【原文：A streaming bundle comprising Disney+, Hulu and Max services will be available in the United States from Thursday for a monthly price of $16.99 with ads, and $29.99 without ads, parent companies Walt Disney and Warner Bros Discovery said.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司因未能续签 NBA 转播权而被撤资
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）股价周四在美国股市盘前交易中下跌超过 4%，此前这家传媒巨头未能续签 NBA 赛事转播权，加剧了投资者对其 TNT 和 Max 流媒体服务前景的担忧。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery shares fell more than 4% in U.S. premarket trading on Thursday, after the media giant failed to renew broadcasting rights for the NBA games, fueling investor concerns over the future of its TNT and Max streaming service.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数降幅超过预期
item.description: 由于天气和汽车厂临时关闭造成的失真逐渐消失，上周新申请失业救济的美国人数降幅超过预期。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell more than expected last week as distortions from the weather and temporary automobile plant closures faded.】

item.title: 交易员认为美联储要等到 9 月才会首次降息
item.description: 在最新数据显示美国经济在上一季度重拾升势后，交易员们加大了对美联储将等到9月份才开始降息的押注。 在数据公布前，交易商认为美联储下周召开会议时降息的可能性约为 9%，但在报告显示上季度经济增速为 2.8%、快于预期后，交易商将这一可能性降至 7% 以下。【原文：Traders added to bets the Federal Reserve will wait until September to start cutting interest rates after the latest data showed the U.S. economy regained steam in the last quarter. Before the data, traders saw about a 9% chance of a rate cut when the Fed meets next week, but knocked that down to under 7% after a report showed the economy grew at a 2.8% pace last quarter, faster than had been expe】

item.title: 欧洲欢迎中东资金，但部分交易面临阻力
item.description: 阿布扎比的 ADNOC 将目光投向了以 117 亿欧元（127.4 亿美元）收购德国化工制造商 Covestro，这将是至少 16 年来中东买家在欧洲进行的最大一笔收购，标志着近来中东地区之间的交易正在上升。【原文：As Abu Dhabi's ADNOC sets its sights on an 11.7 billion euro ($12.74 billion) takeover of German chemical maker Covestro in what would be the largest European acquisition by a Middle Eastern buyer in at least 16 years, it marks a recent upswing in dealmaking between the regions.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济重拾增长动力；通胀放缓
item.description: 美国第二季度经济增长快于预期，但通胀率有所下降，这使得人们对美联储 9 月份降息的预期保持不变。【原文：The U.S. economy grew faster than expected in the second quarter, but inflation subsided, leaving intact expectations of a September interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 截至年中，博雅银行企业支付应用程序处理额达到创纪录的 5000 亿美元
item.description: 美国银行周四在一份声明中表示，截至今年年中，美国银行的企业客户通过其 CashPro 应用程序批准的付款额达到创纪录的 5000 亿美元，与 2023 年同期相比增长了近 40%。【原文：Bank of America’s corporate clients approved a record $500 billion in payments through its CashPro app by mid-year, up almost 40% versus the same period in 2023, the company said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于费率上涨，电力公司 PG&E 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周四，电力公司 PG&E Corp 的第二季度利润超出预期，主要得益于服务费的上涨。【原文：Power company PG&E Corp beat second-quarter profit estimates on Thursday, helped by higher service rates.】

item.title: 人工智能风险越低，欧洲芯片公司面临的问题就越大
item.description: 由于主要汽车和工业客户的需求下降打击了业务前景，加之更广泛的行业调整，较少涉足人工智能芯片的欧洲半导体公司股票周四大幅下挫。【原文：Shares in European semiconductor firms less exposed to AI chips slumped on Thursday as falling demand from their key automotive and industrial clients hit business prospects, on top of a wider sector correction.】

item.title: 工业自动化需求低迷，霍尼韦尔下调年度利润预期
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司（Honeywell International Inc）周四下调了年度利润预期，原因是其工业自动化业务的需求下降，导致这家多元化工业公司的股价在盘前交易中下跌了 4.5%。【原文：Honeywell International Inc on Thursday lowered its annual profit forecast, due to lower demand in its industrial automation business, sending shares of the diversified industrial firm down 4.5% in premarket trade.】

item.title: 开利利润超预期，原因是价格上涨和冷却系统需求增加
item.description: 受惠于价格上涨、供暖、通风和空调产品的强劲需求以及售后维修服务，开利全球周四公布的第二季度利润超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Carrier Global surpassed analysts' estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, benefiting from price hikes, resilient demand for its heating, ventilating and air conditioning products and aftermarket repair services.】

item.title: 联合太平洋公司季度利润增长 7
item.description: 联合太平洋公司周四报告称，在美国铁路运营商提价的帮助下，该公司第二季度利润增长了 7%。【原文：Union Pacific reported a 7% rise in second-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by price hikes implemented by the U.S. railroad operator.】

item.title: 新加坡监察机构称 Grab 不再收购 Trans-cab
item.description: 新加坡竞争监督机构发表声明称，东南亚最大的叫车和送餐公司 Grab 已取消对新加坡第三大出租车运营商 Trans-cab 的收购计划。【原文：Grab , Southeast Asia's biggest ride-hailing and food delivery firm, has called off its proposed acquisition of Singapore's third-largest taxi operator, Trans-cab, according to a statement from Singapore's competition watchdog.】

item.title: Stellantis 将向 One Equity Partners 出售 Comau 机器人部门的大部分股份
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 和 One Equity Partners 周四发表声明称，三家公司将向 One Equity Partners 出售其机器人部门 Comau 的大部分股份，此举旨在支持 Comau 向汽车行业以外的领域扩张。【原文：Carmaker Stellantis will sell a majority stake in its robotic unit Comau to One Equity Partners, the three companies said in a statement on Thursday, in a move aimed at supporting Comau expansion beyond the automotive sector.】

item.title: 流媒体增长令人失望，环球音乐集团股价下跌 30
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）周四公布的第二季度流媒体和订阅收入低于预期，导致该公司市值缩水约 150 亿美元。【原文：Universal Music Group shed around $15 billion off its value on Thursday after the world's biggest music label reported lower-than-expected streaming and subscription revenue for the second quarter.】

item.title: 免疫学药物销售强劲，艾伯维上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 艾伯维（AbbVie）周四上调了年度利润预期，原因是包括Humira在内的主要免疫学药物销售强劲，帮助其第二季度业绩超出华尔街预期。【原文：AbbVie raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday as strong sales of its key immunology drugs, including Humira, helped it beat Wall Street expectations for the second quarter.】

item.title: 石油和金属价格下跌，多伦多证券交易所期货下滑
item.description: 周四，受石油和金属价格下跌的影响，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货价格下跌，同时投资者评估了加拿大央行在周三今年第二次放松政策后进一步降息的可能性。【原文：Futures linked to Canada's main stock index tumbled on Thursday, pulled down by declines in oil and metal prices, while investors assessed the possibility of more rate cuts by the Bank of Canada after easing its policy for the second time this year on Wednesday.】
